entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Pine Falls
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:33 AM CST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 41 this morning and minus 28 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 31.

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of light snow. High minus 21. POP 30%
